unnormalised: Rental Agreements: Don't get caught out, Yaar!
normalised: Rental Agreements: Don't get caught out, friend!

unnormalised: Mumbai: Renting in Maximum City can be a headache, especially with dodgy agreements. Experts are saying now is the time to really understand your rental agreement before you sign on the dotted line.
normalised: Mumbai: Renting in Maximum City can be a headache, especially with dodgy agreements. Experts are saying now is the time to really understand your rental agreement before you sign on the dotted line.

unnormalised: "Too many folks are just skimming these things, then getting surprised later," says Dr. Sharma, a property lawyer in Bandra. "Landlords in Mumbai, Delhi, everywhere, are getting smarter."
normalised: "Too many folks are just skimming these things, then getting surprised later," says Doctor Sharma, a property lawyer in Bandra. "Landlords in Mumbai, Delhi, everywhere, are getting smarter."

unnormalised: Common problems? Unfair clauses around maintenance, sudden rent increases, and restrictions on having friends over for chai-pani. Remember that clause about pets? Check if Sheru, your Labrador, is welcome.
normalised: Common problems? Unfair clauses around maintenance, sudden rent increases, and restrictions on having friends over for chai-pani. Remember that clause about pets? Check if Sheru, your Labrador, is welcome.

unnormalised: Recent reports suggest at least 30% of disputes are avoidable with better understanding. Pay close attention to the security deposit amount (Rs. 50,000 is common!), the lock-in period, and what constitutes "normal wear and tear".
normalised: Recent reports suggest at least thirty percent of disputes are avoidable with better understanding. Pay close attention to the security deposit amount (rupees fifty thousand is common!), the lock-in period, and what constitutes "normal wear and tear".

unnormalised: Also, measure the property yourself! That "1000 sq ft" apartment might be smaller than you think. And remember, registering your agreement at the local Sub-Registrar’s office offers extra legal protection. Happy renting!
normalised: Also, measure the property yourself! That "one thousand square feet" apartment might be smaller than you think. And remember, registering your agreement at the local Sub-Registrar’s office offers extra legal protection. Happy renting!
